Reviews.Title: Just as I expected
Reviews.Author: J. Howell
Reviews.Content: Some of the other reviewers mentioned that you do not get a camera with it. When I first ordered it, I was freaking out thinking it would not come with one. However, the one I got was a official Samsung Blackjack and came with the camera and had everything it was supposed to (Perhaps some of the sellers were sending out knockoff phones? No idea). Everything was brand new, although it came in a generic AT&T; Box with 1 battery, USB cable, and charger. It did not come with a driver CD, however (Although the drivers can be easily be found online).As for the actual phone, it is a very decent upgrade to my Razor V3. The picture quality is pretty decent, and you can put up to a additional 2GB in the phone via the SD Card slot on the side. You can also upgrade it to Windows Mobile 6, which you can get for free by going to the Samsung website and follow the FAQ in the i607 section. The sound quality is pretty decent, and the range of games is just what I was looking for. It might not be able to handle full 3D games all the way, but it does a good job on most of the 2D games. The menus can be a little confusing at times, and the phone is a little older, but look at this if you want to get a no-contract phone on the cheap without going through a phone provider.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone for Costa Rica
Reviews.Author: L. J. "Computer geek"
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is a good samsung's product, It's very usefull and it is compatible with the ICE costarican network, the only thing I don't like from it, is that the sound is very low.

Reviews.Title: It does the job but picture doesn't correspond to the actual phone
Reviews.Author: Alex V. "Alex"
Reviews.Content: OK, what I got was an AT&T; unlocked phone, with no camera on the front as the picture of this product displays in here (that is my only complaint, the phone works like it is supposed to work).The phone is great for me, as it is for a backup plan and the price is just great.  I use a high-tech phone for myself daily so the tech that this Samsung has is not amazing or anything like the kind, but if you're moving from a regular cell phone to a Windows phone, well you will love this Samsung.It is light weight, it has nice display, you can add some Windows mobile applications to it, and it's a 3G phone for less than a 100 bucks, a bargain for my taste.Addional note: The reviewer that put a video in Spanish, said (I will translate some part for you) that he feels ripped off since he got a phone with no camera on the front and that the phone has written the AT&T; badge, that also the description said that the phone would came with to batteries and only got one and that the phone did not came with the factory box but on a regular one.  Also he says that the phone he received was not "new" since the battery had a scratch on it....

Reviews.Title: Bad Company Bad Product
Reviews.Author: Thomas S. Nuzzo "TSN"
Reviews.Content: This phone has broken and I bought a warrenty but you can not get up with anyone to get it replaced Do Not Buy Anything from these people

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Design Addict
Reviews.Content: I love it, its unlocked so I can take it when I travel, which is why I bought it in the first place.

Reviews.Title: This is not what it seems...AT&T; phone.
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I purchase this phone for a Tmobile account, because on the internet , it said works with Tmobile or At&t;, but the true part is, It only works for AT&T.; It is a nice fashionable , light weight phone, but no use because i couldnt activate it. Amazon, was excellent in understanding and issued a complete refund, prepaid label to return. I liked there immediate attention in the matter, to make me feel as a valued customer. I will most definately share my experience with co-worker-friends & family. I was advised to buy here from a co-worker, and she was right, the prompt service and expertise is excellent. This is only for AMAZON.com, the other suppliers they have, that is a total different story.

Reviews.Title: lots of phone for under $100 bucks
Reviews.Author: Daryl Richardson
Reviews.Content: The phone is a steal for the price, i have no problem with the phone, only thing iswhen someone buys a NEW phone, you expect everything in that box to be new. in my case everything was new but the charger, the end lokked like someones chewing toy. other than that am beyond satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: A little dated technology, but perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Michael Meredith "e-Mike"
Reviews.Content: Here is my situation... in addition to the basic communication functions, I expect my phone to keep my calendar, in sync with my MS Outlook (which also syncs with Google Calendar).  The Blackjack does that effortlessly!I originally became so frustrated with my Samsung Solstice a887 Phone (AT&T;) that I resolved to spend the bucks to get an unlocked phone a full year and a half before my contract was to expire.  My chief complaint with the Solstice was the calendar, it's bad enough that it doesn't sync directly with Outlook (it has its own proprietary calendar/contacts software that does that) but the real problem is that the file record limitations for the Solstice mean that you'll retain little more than the name of the appointment, the phone number or address and little else.The Blackjack has none of those limitations, which means that I can put an entire travel itinerary in an appointment file and easily retrieve flight numbers and references without the fear of the text ending early.I like the keyboard, it's great for texting.  And using Activsync, all I have to do is plug my phone into a USB port and the calendar is updated within minutes.Technologically speaking, this is probably a couple years behind the curve.  I wouldn't suggest this to heavy mobile internet users, but for the occaisional email retrieval or send it's fine.  What's important is that you have a good idea as to what functions you'll actually use and/or need.  Why spend more for bells and whistles that hold little or no appeal to you?

Reviews.Title: This phone is a toy/joke for anyone over age 13
Reviews.Author: Rich P
Reviews.Content: I give this phone 1 star because I can't give it zero stars.I thought this would be a good phone for occasional access to the internet as well as keeping a mobile copy of the address book I have on my computer at home.  I found out that in spite of remotely resembling a Blackberry it is nothing of the sort.  It's a kiddie toy.First problem - there's no way to connect to computer, except by miniSD card.  You CAN NOT find drivers so your computer can transfer data via USB cable or Bluetooth.  You can connect a USB cable to it, but it's not for data.  It's just for charging the phone from the PC.  It comes with a wall wart charger.  Yes, the phone has Bluetooth capabilities, but only for headsets, etc.  A Bluetooth receiver on a computer can see and identify the phone.  But without drivers the connection is useless.  You can use the miniSD card, but that means you have to write the address book to the card on your computer, remove it, install it in the phone and then copy the addresses into the phone's address book.  Plus you have to repeat the process or reverse it whenever you add or edit an address.  Ridiculously cumbersome.Also remember if you take any pictures with the phone you cant' transfer them to your PC either.  You either have to use the miniSD card or transmit them to yourself over the data network (using the "pay as you go minutes" the whole time).  If you use the mini SD card the phone restricts maximum miniSD capacity to 16 MB.  If you take very many pictures you're going to have to do the miniSD shuffle more than once for a batch of pictures.  Ridiculously cumbersome.But back to the address book.  The other option is to manually key them in to the phone.  The keys on this phone are not much bigger than grape seeds.  For anyone with fingers larger than a child's keying in the addresses and phone numbers, and having to toggle the function for soem of the keys between alpha and numeric would be ridiculously cumbersome.  Especially when there are other phones available that can transfer the address book from a PC in a matter of seconds.I never got to trying out the phone sound quality, taking any pictures or accessing the web on this phone.  I figured they would be fraught with similar shortcomings and returned the phone.

Reviews.Title: Loved my phone!
Reviews.Author: Sexy Eyes
Reviews.Content: i got this as a gift and from the moment I received my phone I fell in love. Everything worked like clockwork. The camera is very good and takes great pictures. Everything Works great. Have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: COOL I GUESS
Reviews.Author: caleb
Reviews.Content: WELL FOR THIS ITEM I DID PURCHASE IT BECAUSE IT SAYS IT HAS SOME AWESOME COOL FEATURES WHICH IT TURN OUT TO BE WRONG AND THE PHONE DOES NOT EVEN WORK PROPERLY IT WILL TURN ON BUT WILL NOT TURN OFF WHEN I TRY TO PUSH THE POWER BUTTON DOWN...BUT I WILL SAY IT WILL BE GOOD FOR SOMEONE WHO DOES NOT NEED TOO MUCH FEATURES  AND JUST WANT A SIMPLE COMMUNICATIONS FROM A-B.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Pam Smith
Reviews.Content: Amazing! Simple phone. Great Keyboard. Don't have to get a smart phone plan. Long lasting battery. Better than blackjack 2.Love it!

Reviews.Title: questionable
Reviews.Author: ymro21
Reviews.Content: all that I bought by Amazon, this phone is the only thing that I could use, from the moment I received it I could not use it, I never recognized any of the chip telephone companies, my sister also bought one if it worked well. thanks

Reviews.Title: crappy
Reviews.Author: TheUltimateReviewer
Reviews.Content: battery dies all the time and the thing drains faster if it has a text or voicemail that is unopened for some reason. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Its not ok
Reviews.Author: The Pearl
Reviews.Content: I expected a better product, If you going to sell a Product, it should be in a avarage condition, this  phone is just to recieve and make calls, I cann't put in an extra memory becuase the compartment is broken, and I cannot purchase the part for it. Its the first time that I feel disapointed with a purchase from you.

Reviews.Title: Samsung BlackJack Review
Reviews.Author: Nelson
Reviews.Content: I really liked the way the phone has performed.I live in Costa Rica and so far I have not experience any major issue with the phone at least for basic usage which is Inbound/Outbound calling,  text messaging and internet browsing, in fact the connectivity is faster than other more smart phones I had and It also allows me to send international text message which is something I could not do with other phones.The only two observations are:  @ The speaker phone microphone is too low, so it makes it very hard to listen to the other person.  @ It takes longer to learn the featuers because it takes more steps to get to something, so you really need to take the time and play with the phone in order to get it to work at full capacity.

Reviews.Title: No lo recomiendo
Reviews.Author: Francisco Caminero
Reviews.Content: Dificil de manejar... la bateria dura poco, es poco amigable en su uso... no lo recomiendo.... es uno de los moviles más incomodos que he tenido... fue frustrante mientras lo use.Además me lo vendieron como "desbloqueado"... y no fue asi. Tuve que llamar al vendedor y esperar dias para que me resolvieran el problema.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Arturo "Heiner"
Reviews.Content: I buy this in amazon, it is arrive in good condition, buy another one in unlockedcellphonekings and  get damaged, I recommend buying it on amazon. AH and has no camera on the front.

Reviews.Title: Works with ATT, no data fees*
Reviews.Author: Nilo "Man"
Reviews.Content: Good "basic" smart phone. I didn't upgrade the OS and I turned off automatic networking.Never browsed the web or used Outlook.  I haven't been hit with a data charge yet(3 months and counting).  This is a good replacement for a contract phone. I got it for the QWERTY keyboard and to do texting. If you want a replacement this is as good a phone as any I have had. Do not surf the web as the phone's OS will snitch on you and trigger the data plan requirememnt.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement phone for my original black jack
Reviews.Author: Dao Vang
Reviews.Content: I love this phone of all smart phones.yeah its buggy here and there and it doesnt have a touch screen, but im satisfied with the way it feels, and the layout of he keyboard. Im just so used to it. I cant adapt to the touch screens so this is the phone for me!

Reviews.Title: Meet expectation
Reviews.Author: nette
Reviews.Content: I've ordered a new one and i loved it, it was easy to figured out. You can find your outbound text messages and email by clicking the menu then folders and its in your sent meassages. It is very light weight that i can insert it in my waist when i'm on the floor working. I'm very happy having this phone, i used to have the Motorola Razor V3XX Lavender.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Tina L. Evans
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed this phone every since I received it in the mail. The people that helped me with the order were very friendly , patient and helpful.I would recommend it to others. The price was just right without me having to purchase a brand new phone.I am very satisfied. Whenever I am ready to upgrade you can best believe I will shop from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Lame
Reviews.Author: J. Pierson
Reviews.Content: Phone doesnt even turn on. I emailed the seller asking for an exchange but no response yet. I am kind of pissed, having paid for a brand new phone and it wont even charge or power up! The instruction manual seems fishy to me, almost like this is a knock off phone.

Reviews.Title: Good until it died...IT CAME BACK!
Reviews.Author: B. A. Bush "powerfultinyfists"
Reviews.Content: Love this phone at first I though it died but it turned out the battery was completely drained. Apparently if the battery is completely dead you cannot charge it via pc, wall charger works though. Anyways I would give this a 5 but the ringtones are still too quiet

Reviews.Title: very bad experience
Reviews.Author: S. Crayton
Reviews.Content: the phone never worked - it was sent and once i put my sim card in it never worked with my phone - i had to send it back immediately - sorry but not a good experience.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Service
Reviews.Author: Shon
Reviews.Content: I order this phone in May. It was broken the day after I got it. So I send it back to exchange for a new one. Its July now, and I have yet to get my phone. Also when I send email to them a couple times, their replies are the same. It looks like just some bot replying the emails with the exact same message. So, DON'T BUY FROM THEM.

Reviews.Title: Best
Reviews.Author: Daniel Curran
Reviews.Content: This Has The Best Sound, And I Can Here All Calls Better Than My Flip-phone. Thanks For A Great Product, I Like The Extras That It Has For Internet and Alarms. Thanks Again...

ProductInfo.Features:
1.3 megapixel camera
65MB of built-in memory
QWERTY keyboard
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Blackjack i607 Unlocked GSM Phone with 1.3MP Camera, QWERTY Keyboard and Memory Card Slot--U.S. Version without Warranty (Black)
